SEARCH
Package gutek.services

Class DeckService

java.lang.Object
gutek.services.DeckService
@Service public class DeckService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing decks and cards.

    • addNewDeck

      public DeckBase addNewDeck(AppUser loggedUser, RevisionAlgorithm<?> algorithm, String deckName)
      Adds a new deck for the specified user, using the given revision algorithm and deck name.
      Parameters:
      loggedUser - The user to whom the new deck will belong.
      algorithm - The revision algorithm used for the deck.
      deckName - The name of the new deck.
      Returns:
      The newly created deck.

    • findById

      public Optional<DeckBase> findById(Long deckId)
      Retrieves a deck by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      deckId - The unique identifier of the deck.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the DeckBase if found, or empty if no deck with the specified ID exists.
